channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring by VMware -- Spring Cloud Task

item.title: CVE-2020-5428|2024-08-04T08:30:24.237Z -- spring%20by%20vmware -- spring%20cloud%20task
item.description: In applications using Spring Cloud Task 2.2.4.RELEASE and below, may be vulnerable to SQL injection when exercising certain lookup queries in the TaskExplorer.
